objects.name: Analytic 0300
objects.description: Correlation of Mail.app logs with Safari/Chrome activity. Suspicious behavior includes email links → Safari/Chrome accessing newly registered or lookalike domains → osascript or Terminal spawned unexpectedly.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Received messages with embedded or shortened URLs

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Browser processes launching unexpected interpreters (osascript, bash)

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Connections to suspicious domains with mismatched certificate or unusual patterns

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Flag self-signed or mismatched TLS certificates from spearphishing domains.
Suspicious delay between URL click and malicious process spawn.
